author: konmagat
title: Konmaswap a DEX for Cardano
description: 統合された様々なDeFiソリューションやICOを簡単に利用することで、新規ユーザーがカルダノに参入できるプラットフォームがないのです。

f6_assessments.q0: 提案書の全体像は、期待できそうです。提案者は、「新規参入者がDefiの統合されたソリューションやICOを利用できるプラットフォームがない」という問題を解決するために、「Cardanoチェーン上でスマートコントラクトを展開する簡単な方法を提供する」というソリューションを提案しています。チームが影響を与えようとしている層は、主に他のチェーンの既存ユーザーと、それに伴う新規ユーザーです。この提案が成功すれば、カルダノはDefiのホスティングに最適な場所の一つとなるでしょう。DEXやNFT市場を含む計画のすべてのフェーズが順調に完了すれば、エコシステムに多くの変化をもたらし、新たな貢献とカルダノチェーンのオーバーバリューを高めることになる。
f6_assessments.q1: 提案者は、週単位で詳細なロードマップを提供しており、これがチームの信頼性を高めています。また、チームが言及している一連の必要なスキルは、目下の課題に適していると思われます。Konma Labsは、その専門知識と過去のベンチャー企業での成功を示しており、このソリューションを成功させる可能性は非常に高いと思われます。また、要求された予算は、キャンペーン概要に記載されている総資金の20％という制限内に収まっています。また、予算の内訳も非常に緻密で分かりやすいものとなっています。しかし、もう少し情報が必要だと思うのは、チームが直面する可能性のあるリスクと課題、そしてその緩和策についてです。また、この課題に対する新しいソリューションが、他のチェーンにすでに存在する脆弱性をどのように克服するのか。このような情報があれば、読者やコミュニティが提案の成功を確信することができます。
f6_assessments.q2: 提案書で提供される情報は、提案の成功を監査し追跡するのに十分である。提案者は、製品とプロジェクトの両方のKPIを提示し、両方の視点から監査を行っている。また、チームはソフトウェアをオープンソースとして公開することを計画しており、コミュニティが進捗状況を確認できるようになっています。さらに、他のチェーンからの移行を可能にする杭打ちと取引のNFTの増加は、ネットワークトラフィックと価値の増加を示しており、監査人が提案の成功について結論を出すのに役立つ透明なツールとなっています。フェーズIが完了すると、6ヶ月後に実装されたDEXに上場したコインの数も、監査プロセスで利用できる追加指標となります。以上の理由から、明確性と監査可能性は明確であり、5点満点中5点を付けたいと思います。

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal intends to create a DEX featuring an array of DeFi-options.  It is part of a larger project spanning 7 proposals in fund 7. The intention of the main project seems to be to create a sub-ecosystem on the Cardano blockchain. A DEX with DeFi-abilities is a crucial part in the whole that is intended. The DEX has a dual function as there is a set objective to bridge with other blockchains, putting the ERC20-converter to use and generating an influx of community members on this one.
f6_assessments.q1: The plan is ambitious, but not impossible. The proposers still need to assemble a team for this. There has been provided a clear definition of the functions that are still needed.  It also needs identification of who already is in the team.
f6_assessments.q2: Highly auditable proposal, aside from the team member identification and expected public launch date. To improve, try to include profiles of each team member and corresponding skills.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal is clearly a DeFi protocol that seeks to become a competitor in the DEX space of Cardano.
f6_assessments.q1:
Although they give some indication as to recruitment of various personnel and developers that can work in Haskell, not much evidence is presented in regards to the team and why we should trust that they will be able to successfully do all of this. 

From what can be inferred from the proposal, the budget is mostly going to be used to recruit developers and so it seems like the proposers will fill the role of being managers and strategists. However, if this is the value-added of the team itself then more details in regards to the team's capacity to recruit effectively and the details of the DEX itself. Usually proposals that ask for amounts in the range of $75k will have MVPs or a very strong track record.
f6_assessments.q2: The milestones provided are very clear and easy to follow up on as they are provided on a weekly basis with recruitment in the first two weeks and ICO by week 23. However, they do not indicate any KPIs such as the number of users. This is a minor point that doesn't justify a reduction of stars but still something they could improve on for the next round.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal able to identifies the problem properly, by creating a DEX platform for the Cardano ecosystem. They create this DEX to provide an easy way to deploy smart contracts on the cardano chain and utilize Sales tools for an easy ICO process and more, which not only aligned to this challenge settings but also will further drive adoption to Cardano ecosystem in the future.
f6_assessments.q1: The team working on this proposal can be verified and proven on their website link, which have Linkedin profile. Konma is an organization and have an orchestra of different proposal (seven of them) on this Fund 7. Konmaswap is one of their project out of many, but that doesn't lower the quality of each proposal they made. From the knowledge of the teams needed (and how to find them), the detailed goals and plan, budget breakdowns, action plans, the KPI, product KPI, all of this is explained very well and in details. Especially regarding the skills requirement for the team. It shows that Konma are able to identify the resource needed for this kind of project to succeed. Overall, from this well written proposal alone, there is a high chance of success that this project will come to fruition. Keep in mind that there are 6 other proposal by Konma team in this Fund 7, and it shows their dedication and hardships.
f6_assessments.q2: The roadmap is explained in weekly basis. Metrics and KPIs are provided, alongside with their goals, demographic description, and action plan. In term of auditability, this proposal is feasible to be audited from the activity on their website, social media, and the project metrics / KPIs itself.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal accurately addresses the challenge and if successful would boost Cardano's Defi Ecosystem. However it would be great to hear what makes Konma unique in its proposal as there are already multiple DEXs launching on the ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q1: Whilst links to Konma are provided it is very difficult to determine what skills exactly the team brings with them. There is mention of Consulting Mlbas, or Emurgo but due to the size of the funds requested it would be great to see the in house experience available. The funds requested are broken down and the timeline seems accurate for the scope of the work but without knowing the experience of the team it is impossible to determine feasibility.
f6_assessments.q2: A clear roadmap has been provided that can be followed and aids in audibility. The KPIs could use some refinement in terms of how much value the proposal is actually bringing to the ecosystem as a whole.

solution: KonmaSwapは、スマートコントラクトをカルダノチェーン上に展開するための簡単な方法を提供し、セールスツールを活用して簡単にICOを行うことができるようになります。
experience: Konma Labzは、様々なプロトコルやプロジェクトが実施するハッカソンに参加しています。また、15以上の分野でブロックチェーンの統合を支援しています。
